name: TheWeatherChannel
0:
”Alexa, ask weather channel what's the weather.”
”Alexa, open weather channel”
”Alexa, ask weather channel for the pollen level outside”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weather channel
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Weather Channel skill provides accurate forecasts from the world’s most trusted weather source, with information about temperature, chance of rain and more – along with severe weather alerts and radar (for Alexa devices with screens).
 
You can ask The Weather Channel skill for information about:
- Current Temperature
- High and Low Temperature
- Precipitation: Rain, Snow
- Severe weather
- Pollen
- Privacy
- Weekend Weather
- Updates on the Coronavirus outbreak
And more
 
EXCLUSIVE WEATHER INSIGHTS
Some weather reports just provide the numbers – the temperature, chance of precipitation – the usual. With The Weather Channel skill, you get all of the basic weather information, plus valuable, proactive tips that go beyond the routine forecast, for example:
- When there’s a chance of rain -- so you can plan ahead
- When it will be humid - so you can plan to keep yourself cool 
- When UV will be high -- so you can plan to avoid sunburn
- When there’s a significant temperature change - so you can plan how to dress 
- When there’s an update on coronavirus in your area - so you have access to the latest updates

SPECIAL FEATURES
- Radar (for Alexa devices with screens)
- National Weather Service alerts
